Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: 6 Barriers to Crypto Adoption and Why They Matter  Cryptocurrency and its foundational technology, blockchain, have the potential to be incredibly transformative for many industries. But like many other technologies that came before it, widespread adoption is going to be slow.  To make matters worse, Deloitte pointed out in a recent survey that â€œblockchain fatigueâ€ has taken hold. People are already tired of hearing about it every day and just about everywhere. But thatâ€™s not whatâ€™s causing the primary hangup, believe it or not.  Here's the full story: https://blog.blockonomics.co/6-barriers-to-crypto-adoption-and-why-they-matter-fafb7b750d40

Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce

Author: setpass
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: The relationship between Bitcoin, E-commerce, online payments continues to evolve and will soon reach a more rewarding point for both merchants and buyers. E-commerce is driven by a wide range of payment methods that best suit the diverse preferences of consumers, the options that define each transaction, and the general attributes of the product or service. However, the commonality of these methods is the existence of a trusted third party gateway, which handles the facilitation of payment within the transaction. Until recently, there a widely-available equivalent to cash in E-commerce did not exist, even though the need for a sort of electronic money was obvious - especially in the areas of micropayments. This inefficiency was highlighted in 2008 by Satoshi Nakamoto (a pseudonym for an individual or group of programmers) in a white paper entitled â€œBitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash Systemâ€. The paper suggested a mechanism based on peer-to-peer networking, through which a payment system could eliminate financial intermediaries and allow users to make direct and relatively anonymous transactions via the Internet (Polasik et al., 2015).

Author: setpass
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: Looking closer at the platform benefits, Blockonomics guarantees the absolute lack of middlemen, the lack of access to usersâ€™ private keys, the lack of KYC/documentation and the direct and instant E-commerce payments and donations to any SegWit or non-SegWit wallet. To enhance their platform services, Blockonomics have issued BCK tokens. BCK is a utility token that enables support to BCH, LTC, and ETH and Lightning Network integration. Moreover, it sends API with Multi-signature wallet. These tokens provide a variety of perks to customers too. Key Details about BCK tokens: Customers can use BCK tokens to over 2000+ worldwide Blockonomics powered sores, without paying any payment fee for BCK transaction on the platform. In case of E-commerce purchases to Blockonomics powered E-commerce sites, customers alongside Bitcoin will be able to use BCK tokens, availing discounts on the purchased items. Lastly, using BCK token, customers can get bonuses/rewards on transacting. In Blockonomics market, the BCK token price will exist in the function of supply and demand. The total supply is capped at 1,000,000,000 BCK

Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce

Author: btc_enigma
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: About Blockonomics Blockonomics started as a wallet watcher and blockexplorer in 2014, and has been continuously innovating with the latest in Bitcoin technology. Blockonomics is a decentralized and permissionless Bitcoin payment solution, where our services enhance the functionality of the wallets you already own. Our goal is to continue allowing you to accept Bitcoin directly, whether you're invoicing, receiving donations, or running an e-commerce store. We strongly believe the power of Bitcoin is in decentralization and cryptography.    The ICO has been Paused  Current Products  Bitcoin Wallet Watcher Keep tabs of your Bitcoin addresses/xpub all in one place. Receive email notification of transactions. View graphs of your balance history and separate wallets by tags.   Peer to peer invoices Easiest way to send a Bitcoin invoice without worrying about the fluctuating price. Your invoices are also encrypted, enhancing privacy.   BlockExplorer One of the popular and reliable Blockexplorers in Bitcoin. Lightweight, fast, and allows user to query multiple addresses. Pioneer and leader in Bech32/Segwit adoption.   Directly to wallet merchant service Allows merchants to accept bitcoin directly to their HD wallets. No approvals/KYC required. Plugins for popular e-commerce platforms like Woocommerce, Prestashop   Send bitcoin via email A decentralized way to send Bitcoin to your friends and family via email. No Bitcoin keys are stored on our servers. Uses split key generation to achieve distributed trust.    Traction  Leader Blockexplorer in Bech32 adoption World's most popular bitcoin wallet watcher Widely used P2P encrypted invoice service  Used by 2000 + Merchants worldwide     Processing 50,000 + Ecommerce transaction Daily         Monitoring 1 Million + Bitcoin Addresses   Roadmap    Token Sale/Dates  BCK Token - Total Supply - 1,000,000,000 Merchants are not charged any fee when accepting BCK Get rewards/bonus everytime you use your coin Get discounts to buy services on blockonomics.co, and partner stores  Presale starts on 1 July 2018 20% Bonus during presale Mainsale from 1 - 15 August 2018      Links/Docs  ICO Website FAQ Litepaper Tokenpaper Whitepaper    Bounty Thread  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4460139  Join the conversation on     Thanks to the BitcoinTalk community for your continued support in helping us evolve into  one of the leading blockexplorer and merchant gateway. We look forward to taking Bitcoin to next level. For some History - Here is our ANN thread from back in 2014 !!  Register now to get regular updates and priority in upcoming sale  Looking forward to hearing from you

Author: loicuagio1979
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: Hi Dev Agree with your solution. However, after spending about 2 hours to read your project, I have some questions for you: 1. Your WP keeps repeating that "Since 2015, Blockonomics has helped thousands of E-commerce sites increase sales by including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other major altcoins as a payment option for their customers." but you did NOT give your readers any examples, such as: which sites, how much money has been increased, what exactly did you help, etc. Moreover, your road map does NOT point out your help since 2015 because it starts from Sept 2018. So, tell me as detailed as possible 2. In June 2019, you are planning to support Lightning Network integration for users with aims to reduce payment fee. Well, as you can see, one of the biggest concern of users is that the security because they have to use off-chain transactions. What's your solution in this case and how different it is from current method and your competitors? 3. According to Alexa.com, your site is hosted in Boardman, Oregon, 97818, United States and your traffic is mostly from USA and India. Also, your WP states that "The Company registered office and address for service can be found on our website." but I can't find the information in you site. In short, where are your office location and why do you have 700 daily visitors but you seem to be brand new to investors?  Regards

Author: Dlugina23
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: Any bounty for facebook and twitter?

Author: btc_enigma
Title: [ANN][ICO] Blockonomics - ReImagining Bitcoin and E-Commerce
Body: Appreciate your queries .  1. Our merchants page has detail on this. The customer websites/testimonials can be found on the below links https://blog.blockonomics.co/accepting-bitcoin-payments-how-it-has-helped-merchants-a7cf1e6e3ee2 https://blog.blockonomics.co/whmcs-sites-accepting-bitcoin-payments-great-idea-d80191ed8a6 We have already been operational since 2015. You can see our progress on this thread.  2. Lightning network is still in beta. Our dedicated node will have channels open to all major lightning nodes. Our merchants can accept lightning payments using this. Problem with lightning network is not security. The off chain transactions themselves are secure. A lightning node can watch the network for fraud and has locktime mechanisms to stop double spends  3. We are not brand new ... as I said we have been around since 2015. Lots of people in bitcoin community know about us. This ICO is a recent development. Here is our company address
